description: This instrumentation enables INTERNAL spans for jobs run by the Spring Batch framework.

configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.spring-batch.experimental-span-attributes
configurations.description: Adds the experimental attribute `job.system` to spans.

configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.spring-batch.experimental.chunk.new-trace
configurations.description: When enabled, a new root span will be created for each chunk processing. Please note that this may lead to a high number of spans being created.

configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.spring-batch.item.enabled
configurations.description: When enabled, spans will be created for each item processed. Please note that this may lead to a high number of spans being created.
